name: Cat Gifts (rthurmed)
description:
Cat Gifts Explore the house and bring gifts to your human

You are a cat who share a house with a human. He gives you food. To return the favor you must give something back. Luckly your house has all sorts of animais and plants that can be hunted and given to the human.

Platform around the house to find gifts for the human. Every gift gives you some amount of points. After 4 minutes you receive you score.

Controls:

A or Left: Move left
D or Right: Move right
W or Up: Jump
Space: Grab/Give item
P or Escape: Pause
